Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Enable signing for builds" (#1331) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
After the move to the dotnet org, signing has borken for the repo. We need to fix this so we can get builds out to try out v3.0 features.

/cc @tomjebo @mikeebowen not sure who this should be assigned to, but I believe I heard you talking about it at one of the syncs

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Do not require container to load all relationships in constructor" (#1332) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Opening a package would implicitly open all child relationships (parts, dataparts, links, etc) even if those are never needed. This change adds a layer between the container and the package to handle the relationships so that they can be retrieved lazily.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Move relationship handling out of package" (#1330) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
The SDK handled Strict->Transitional namespace conversion automatically,
but in a way that forces it to be continuously tracked. This has been
moved into a relationship filter that will handle this a single time and
then it doesn't need to be calculated again.
